channel.title: GitHub Assembly Daily Trending
channel.description: Daily Trending of Assembly in GitHub

item.title: openhwgroup/cva6
item.description: The CORE-V CVA6 is an Application class 6-stage RISC-V CPU capable of booting Linux

item.title: apple/swift-nio-ssl
item.description: TLS Support for SwiftNIO, based on BoringSSL.

item.title: ROCm/hipBLASLt
item.description: hipBLASLt is a library that provides general matrix-matrix operations with a flexible API and extends functionalities beyond a traditional BLAS library

item.title: BLAKE3-team/BLAKE3
item.description: the official Rust and C implementations of the BLAKE3 cryptographic hash function

item.title: apple/swift-crypto
item.description: Open-source implementation of a substantial portion of the API of Apple CryptoKit suitable for use on Linux platforms.

item.title: Rangi42/polishedcrystal
item.description: An upgrade to Pokémon Crystal. Brings features and content up to date, and adds some original content.

item.title: lukechampine/blake3
item.description: An AVX-512 accelerated implementation of the BLAKE3 cryptographic hash function

item.title: riscvarchive/riscv-v-spec
item.description: Working draft of the proposed RISC-V V vector extension

item.title: SpinalHDL/VexRiscv
item.description: A FPGA friendly 32 bit RISC-V CPU implementation

item.title: aws/aws-lc
item.description: AWS-LC is a general-purpose cryptographic library maintained by the AWS Cryptography team for AWS and their customers. It іs based on code from the Google BoringSSL project and the OpenSSL project.
